name: Drag and drop list
description: This component is a list with floating elements.

properties.name: itemsArray
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine items array.
properties.label: Items Array

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine title.

properties.name: draggableListVisibility
properties.label: Visibility
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if Draggable List should be visible.

properties.name: allowDelete
properties.label: Allow Delete
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if item allowed deleted

properties.name: allowEdit
properties.label: Allow Edit
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if item allowed edited

properties.name: allowAdd
properties.label: Allow Add Item
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine if item allowed added

eventHandlers.name: onDrag
eventHandlers.label: On Drag Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user dragged list item.

eventHandlers.name: onDelete
eventHandlers.label: On Delete Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user deleted list item.

eventHandlers.name: onEdit
eventHandlers.label: On Edit Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user edited list item.

eventHandlers.name: onAdd
eventHandlers.label: On Add Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user added list item.
